title: Got Perma Ban // Help
body:
Is there anyway im able to contest this?

I admit I was wrong in the last game I flamed, but I was heavily provoked and I was definitely not the aggressor. Had a shit day and someone triggered 
me pretty awfully tbh. Then to randomly see I got perma banned is pretty crappy, I was expecting a 2 week or something suspension when i randomly got Dc'd. We all have bad days. 

I really want an Riot employee to properly review the logs and see how hard the aggressor triggered myself and my other team mates. 
As a Law Student, I wrote an essay about the lack of an appeals process in League of Legends both for amateur and professional level. To see money etc,
go to waste without being at least able to justify some things and give context is pretty crappy.

I know im going to get memed pretty hard lol, but just hoping someone actually helps out here. 

ACC: xRengo

replies.body:
You have a couple options here, you can either post your chat logs from your reform card here on the boards for us to look at, or you can appeal the ban through support [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

To explain a little, rarely will you be perma banned for a single offense. Punishment is typically done in 4 steps:

10 game chat restriction
25 game chat restriction
14 day account ban
Permanent account ban

Except in extreme cases such as hate speech and death threats (or consistent gameplay abuse or cheating) you will receive them in order. It takes 3 months to drop one tier.

Be aware though that a punishment won't be revoked unless it is done in error.

You can find more info about the systems in place here, maybe it'll help some:
- [Player Behaviour FAQ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/L65wrRYe-player-behaviour-faq-updated-for-instant-feedback)
- [Reportable Behaviour](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player#h1q1)
- [Bans Without Warnings](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/nu6A0TNn-perma-banned?comment=0003)
- [Intent Feeding and Extreme Cases](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/oH6zB1eg-detecting-and-banning-extreme-intentional-feeders)

Perma ban is permanent. For the three months, if you are where your next punishment will be a 14 day ban (so you've just had a 25 game chat rest) then if you demonstrate good behaviour for three months your next punishment will be a 25 game chat restriction, hence the dropping a tier.
